attributes.additional_details: It is unfair for Pensioners who have paid full National Insurance Contributions to receive a substantially lower State Pension which creates a two tier system based unfairly on age.
attributes.background: Increase the Old State Pension to the same level as the New State Pension to remove the unfair differential.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Increase the basic State Pension to align with the new State Pension
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615271

Or this petition: 

Increase State pensions to £380 a week, and lower retirement age to 60
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617603
